modName: Sabine Joubert and Zuna Followers by Gman749
summary: Adds deadly Breton assassin and former member of the Dark Brotherhood,  Sabine Joubert, as well as powerful Altmer mercenary and enemy of the Thalmor, Zuna
descriptionHtml:
Silent and unseen, Sabine is one of Skyrims most notorious assassins and never misses her mark.  Out of the Dark Brotherhood and working for herself,  she has decided fighting alongside the Dragonborn is a worthy cause! Skilled with a bow and one handed weapons. 

She can be found at the Winking Skeever. Default armor is Thieves Guild armor.

 Update: new version 4.0, fixed an issue in  3.0 there  where Sabine's torso wasn't visible unclothed. As an added bonus I have also included the Altmer bound weapons master Zuna,  she can be found at the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun, default is dwarven armor.

Sabine
Perks:
Assassins Blade
Agile Defender 60
Silent Roll
Stealth 80
Critical Shot 60
Backstab 
Overdraw 60
Power Shot 
Deadly Aim

Zuna perks
Mystic Binding 
Master- Conjuration


Requirements

XPMSE 

HDT physics 

UNP based body

Recommended 

[url=https://www.google.com/amp/wtfuun.tumblr.com/post/143826934048/elven-sniper-uunp-hdt-need-this/amp]Elven Sniper UUNP [/url]

[url=https://www.loverslab.com/topic/27618-blacktalon-armor-for-unp/]Blacktalon armor[/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3871/]Weapons of the Third Era [/url]﻿

Background 
Name - Sabine Joubert
Gender - Female
 Race - Breton
Age - 29
Sexuality - straight
Status - single
Height - 5'6
Weight - 127 lbs
Occupation - former member of the Dark Brotherhood,  currently freelance assassin

 Sabine is one of the few,  possibly the only,  former member of the Dark Brotherhood to leave their ranks and still be breathing.  not that the DB didn't try to send people after her,  but after many unsuccessful attempts, and a carriage -full of dead assassins, the shadowy guild decided it wasnt worth any more effort and resources. she is quite possibly the best ever at what she does,  clean and calculated and obsessively a stickler for details,  (and a neat-freak). she never had failed a contract,  but over time she felt acute pangs of guilt over many of her targets,  who in many cases were not criminals,  just happened to have crossed the wrong people.  continually disgusted at the casual bloodlust displayed by her comrades she decided to quit and go into business for herself,  only taking contracts that she considers justified.



Thanks to all the excellent mod Authors of Skyrim Nexus, the incredible talent in the Image Gallery and especially,  my friends at the Art Fletcher Discord server who helped assist me with troubleshooting :) love you guys!
